channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 20th November
item.description:
At the rear of no. 53 Poplar place on the footpath there is a mattress and an old broken pallet and at the rear of no.33 there is glass door and some kind of panelling this has been here for over 1 year as well as the pallet the mattress has been there for about 4 months there is also another matress been dumped further along the path towards the school gate
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Poplar Place, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage Tree - pavement moves., 20th November
item.description:
Shirley Ward of 24 Hassett Road, E9 5SN called to report the big tree in front of her property causing the pavement to come out. The root of the tree is going underneath the pavement. She would like your dept to come and remove it Her son had accidents.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hassett Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes all over the road - needs fully resurfaced, 20th November
item.description:
Potholes have been a persistent problem on Honor Oak Road and the spot repairs which have been done are inadequate. There are currently about 50 potholes, only some of which are in the attached photos. The council need to resurface the whole stretch of road as it has been in constant disrepair for years and is damaging cars and is dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honor Oak Park, Honor Oak, Lewisham, London Borough of Lewisham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumping of rubbish daily by same person, 20th November
item.description:
Dumping of rubbish daily on Wynell Road, top corner of Shifford Path (near to 53 Shifford Path). believed to be the same person possibly living at HMO on Shifford Path. Bins are less than 20 metres away but person insists on dumping them in the same spot for vermin and wind to spread along the street. This is continuing to happen despite polite written notice. Has been going on daily for last 8 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wynell Road, Perry Vale, Sydenham, London Borough of Lewisham
Report on FixMyStreet
